reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress well-made, comfortable, and versatile, with one noting it doesn't show body imperfections. The dress features a silky soft material that flows well, and customers appreciate its flattering cap sleeve design that suits various body types. They like the pockets, which easily accommodate large cell phones, and one customer mentions they maintain their position even after washing.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like everything about this dress (+ Oct. update).
items.body: This dress is all the things the reviews say it is. The fit is tts, pockets are a win, light-weight, scuba type fabric is super comfy and the underarm coverage is nice. I’m 5’6 and the length was fine. It would be great for travel and for casual to dressy events. The price point is fair. I’m ready to order other colors! UPDATE: A “Limited Time” offer was sent in this dress, so I ordered the Navy, Olive & Blush Pink colors (late Oct.) Got the first two immediately, but the pink was delayed. (I canceled the pink, b/c I needed it right away.) Love them. The light-weight, scuba type fabric seems the exact same to me, in all three colors. It’s too cool for winter, so I’ll have to layer. I wear a half-slip in the summer & winter, which helps to smooth things out. I’m short waisted and the dresses look great with a drop waist belt. I’d like more colors and a long sleeve, heavier weight fabric version of this dress would be great. Read more
items.author: Peace Frog

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress that is well made and you will love it!
items.body: This is one of my favorite dresses. The fabric is soft and just the right thickness, it’s not thin like others I have purchased. It’s so comfortable to wear and you can’t see your bra the way it is made. You can wear a cute sweater with it and wear it year round. When I wear it I always get compliments. Read more
items.author: Nancy Kellems Goldberg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great versatile dress!
items.body: I bought the navy blue dress and it was very comfortable. You can dress it up or wear it casual. I am 5’4” 127lbs athletic build and ordered a small. True to size. It has pockets also. It is loosely fitted. Not snug but not baggy. My sister got the Royal blue in Medium. She is 5’8” around 140lbs. She could have gotten away with small due to her size. But length would have been a little shorter. It hits right about ankle length. I wore slip on wedges. My sister wore tennis shoes. It would look good with heels also! The material is really soft. Definitely recommend!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dresses
items.body: Love these! Ordered 4 colors. It fit exactly how i wanted loose and comfortable. The colors look like the pictures. It's lightweight for summer but I've paired it with a turtle neck and thermal leggings and it works! The pockets! A must have for me in dresses now. It's well made and worth the purchase! Read more
items.author: Anya

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Much nicer than expected
items.body: This dress is very nice and surprisingly well made. It is extremely flattering - cut well and fits perfectly. One very helpful plus is that the dress was designed with fabric under each arm hole to hide your bra strap. This has been a problem with many sleeveless shirts and dresses I’ve tried on, so I really appreciate that detail. The fabric is very soft and feels much more expensive than expected - it feels like a luxury brand, with the softness rivaling the LOFT Lou & Grey signaturesoft fabric. We’ll see how it holds up over time. I’m planning on dry cleaning it to preserve the fabric. I am 5’7, 137 lbs and I ordered a small, which fits perfectly. I ordered coffee brown, which I turned out to be a beautiful rich color. I will be ordering a couple more of these! Read more
items.author: Marcia L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend
items.body: This is a super cute basic black dress but the material, the pockets and the top part of the shoulder elevate it! I haven't wore it without sleeves as I pair it with an over sized sweater and wore a belt to tuck in the front of the weather and it looks so cute! I will be wearing this dress a lot as it's fine for every season! I would highly recommend! I want another for a backup. It hits 2-3 inches from my ankle. I am 5'8" and 215ish on a good day. I got a 2XL. Read more
items.author: Aaron

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress, Great Quality
items.body: I love this dress so much! I have it in black and brown. Great quality. Good material and stitching. Soft! Washes and dries easily. Has a slit on the side. Pairs nice with a jacket. Read more
items.author: -Lorie-

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will purchase more
items.body: Very comfortable. Love the look and style. True to size. Short girl friendly. I ordered a Medium. No smells from packaging. Great quality. Read more
items.author: Shopper

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Avocado Green, Brown, Fp Houndstooth, Light Coffee, Fp Fortune Cookie, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Camel, Deep Pink, Ginger, Pj Black White, Dark Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
